EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Strategy Workshop_DC_Q217.2017 Field Event Post Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us at the Cloud-Native Strategy Workshop - DC
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for being a part of the Cloud-Native Strategy Workshop at Pivotal DC. We hope our event provided you with a clear perspective on the process and technology it takes to become a cloud-native <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native]]> organization.
We have made the presentation slides available for you below:
- Cloud-Native Strategy Workshop Presentations <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-native-strategy-workshop-washington-dc]]>
If you have any questions or are interested in having Pivotal present cloud-native content to your organization please contact us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
Thank you again for joining us!
The Pivotal Team
